reporter.displayName: XML: choose from columns and/or tables

reporter.name: json
reporter.displayName: JSON: choose from columns and/or tables

columnAttribute.name: gene_type
columnAttribute.help: Gene product category

columnAttribute.name: product
columnAttribute.help: official gene name/protein product for this gene

reporter.name: wordCloud
reporter.description: Display the terms in the attribute as word clouds

columnAttribute.name: evidence_code
columnAttribute.help: The evidence code reflects the type of work or analysis described in the cited reference which supports the association of the GO term to the gene product. More information on evidence codes can be found on http://www.geneontology.org/page/guide-go-evidence-codes.

linkAttribute.name: pathway_link
linkAttribute.help: view pathway at KEGG or Reactome

columnAttribute.name: evidence
columnAttribute.help: Gene ontology (GO) evidence code supporting how the pathway annotation was determined; available only for Reactome pathways

table.name: study001_within_lineage_comparisons
table.description:
Comparisons between successive stages of erythrocyte differentiation within Primitive or Definitive Erythropoiesis (Fetal/Adult) in which this gene is significantly differentially expressed (FDR <= 0.2).

View Experiment Details
Search Comparison Results

columnAttribute.name: cell_or_lineage
columnAttribute.help: erythroid lineage

columnAttribute.name: fdr
columnAttribute.help: permutation-based false discovery rate estimate

columnAttribute.name: ref_condition
columnAttribute.help: reference condition for the comparison

columnAttribute.name: alt_condition
columnAttribute.help: alternative condition for the comparison

columnAttribute.name: ref_mean_expression
columnAttribute.help: mean mRNA expression over reference condition replicates

columnAttribute.name: alt_mean_expression
columnAttribute.help: mean mRNA expression over alternative condition replicates

table.name: study001_across_lineage_comparisons
table.description:
Comparisons of equivalent stages of erythrocyte differentiation across erythroid lineages in which this gene is significantly differentially expressed (FDR < 0.2).

table.name: study002_lineage_comparisons
table.description:
Comparisons between successive stages of erythroid progenitors (stress erythropoiesis) within treated or control samples in which this gene is significantly differentially expressed (adj. p-value ≤ 0.05).

View Experiment Details
Search Comparison Results

columnAttribute.name: cell_or_lineage
columnAttribute.help: EPO challenged or control sample

columnAttribute.name: ref_condition
columnAttribute.help: reference condition for the comparison

columnAttribute.name: ref_mean_expression
columnAttribute.help: log2 mean mRNA expression over reference condition replicates

columnAttribute.name: alt_condition
columnAttribute.help: alternative condition for the comparison

columnAttribute.name: alt_mean_expression
columnAttribute.help: log2 mean mRNA expression over alternative condition replicates

columnAttribute.name: adj_p_value
columnAttribute.help: Benjamini-Hochberg adjusted p-value

columnAttribute.name: confidence_interval
columnAttribute.help: [lower, upper] 95% confidence interval on fold change. Most useful for interpreting fold changes less/greater than +/-2. If the interval is broad or lower and upper limits have opposing signs, then the there is less confidence in the fold change value.

table.name: study002_treatment_comparisons
